description: Subscriber reports Red LOS light on ONT. No connectivity since morning.
priority: High
resolution_summary: Found a micro-bend in the fiber patch cord at the subscriber end. Replaced patch cord; signal levels restored to -19dBm.

description: User getting only 10Mbps on a 100Mbps plan via Ethernet.
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Identified a faulty Cat5 cable limiting the link speed to 10/100. Replaced with Cat6; speed tests now confirm 94Mbps.

description: ONT is power cycling every 5 minutes.
priority: High
resolution_summary: Power adapter was outputting unstable voltage. Replaced 12V DC adapter; ONT stability confirmed for 24 hours.

description: Customer unable to see the 5GHz SSID on new iPhone.
priority: Low
resolution_summary: Logged into ONT; 5GHz radio was disabled. Enabled 5GHz, set channel width to 80MHz, and synchronized SSIDs.

description: Bulk reports of "No Link" in the North Sector.
priority: Critical
resolution_summary: Main distribution fiber cut due to road construction. Splicing team repaired the 24-core backbone fiber.

description: PPPoE error "Authentication Failed" on router logs.
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Found a typo in the username on the radius server. Corrected credentials and reset the session.

description: Core switch Port 15 shows no activity despite cable swap.
priority: High
resolution_summary: Confirmed SFP module failure. Replaced SFP with a new 10G LR module; link restored.

description: Customer paid via app but account still shows "Suspended."
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Payment gateway callback failed. Manually updated the ledger and triggered the automated un-suspension script.

description: High latency (200ms+) reported during peak evening hours.
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Identified congestion on the secondary uplink. Re-routed traffic via the primary 10G link and optimized OSPF costs.

description: CRM dashboard not loading ticket history for specific agents.
priority: Low
resolution_summary: Identified a JavaScript error in the caching layer. Cleared server-side Redis cache and patched the API endpoint.

description: New engineer needs read-only access to the OLT management console.
priority: Low
resolution_summary: Created a new LDAP user entry and assigned the 'Network-Monitor' role. Verified login.

description: Request to increase bandwidth for the annual "Day Zero" event.
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Temporarily modified the rate-limit profile on the subscriber port from 100M to 1G.

description: "Connected, No Internet" on all devices. DNS probe failed.
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Found DNS servers were set to an old IP. Updated DHCP pool to use Google DNS (8.8.8.8) and Cloudflare (1.1.1.1).

description: User changed settings and can no longer access the router admin page.
priority: Low
resolution_summary: Performed a hard factory reset. Reconfigured PPPoE and Wi-Fi settings remotely.

description: Signal is very weak in the bedroom (30 feet from router).
priority: Low
resolution_summary: Advised customer on router placement. Relocated ONT to a central position and changed Wi-Fi channel to 11 to avoid interference.

description: Upload speed is significantly lower than download speed on symmetrical plan.
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Found ingress noise on the upstream frequency. Tightened connectors and replaced a faulty splitter.

description: User getting "Maximum sessions reached" error.
priority: Medium
resolution_summary: Hung session found on the BRAS. Cleared the MAC binding and restarted the PPPoE session.

description: Tickets are not auto-assigning to the correct department.
priority: Low
resolution_summary: Fixed logic in the assignment engine where 'issue_category_id' was being misread as a string.

description: Entire apartment complex reporting no service.
priority: Critical
resolution_summary: Found the local MDU switch was powered down. Building maintenance restored power to the utility room.

description: SFP port on OLT is blinking orange.
priority: High
resolution_summary: Diagnosed as a failing laser in the transceiver. Replaced SFP; light levels normalized.

description: VoIP calls dropping and "robotic" voice reported by office staff.
priority: Identified high jitter on the WAN interface. Implemented Quality of Service (QoS) tagging (DSCP EF) for SIP traffic.

description: Desktop PC says "Unidentified Network" via LAN cable.
priority: Found static IP configured on the NIC from a different subnet. Reverted to DHCP; IP assigned successfully.

description: ONT "Internet" LED is green but no data passing to the router.
priority: Bridge mode was misconfigured on the ONT. Reset to Routing mode and re-entered PPPoE credentials.

description: Client wants to isolate Guest Wi-Fi from the internal corporate network.
priority: Created a new SSID mapped to VLAN 200. Enabled "AP Isolation" to prevent guest-to-guest communication.

description: Complete loss of signal at the OLT uplink port.
priority: Backhaul provider confirmed a fiber cut 5km from the POP. Service restored after splicing was completed.

description: Requesting VPN access for a remote consultant.
priority: Created a Split-Tunnel VPN profile in FortiClient and issued a 2FA token to the user.

description: NAS drive not accessible; status light blinking red.
priority: Identified a failed HDD in the RAID 5 array. Replaced drive; parity rebuilding initiated and access restored.

description: Move the ONT from the living room to the study room upstairs.
priority: Field technician rerouted the drop cable and installed a new internal fiber socket in the study.

description: Speeds are fine during the day but drop to <1Mbps after 8 PM.
priority: Investigated area-level splitters. Found over-subscription on the local PON port. Balanced load across a new port.

description: User keeps getting "Password Expired" on the Wi-Fi portal.
priority: Synchronized Active Directory with the Wi-Fi Controller. Advised user to reset password via the web portal.

description: Mobile app shows "Internal Server Error 500" when viewing billing history.
priority: Found a null pointer exception in the SQL query for legacy accounts. Patched the backend controller.

description: Double-charged for the month of December.
priority: Verified two transactions in the payment logs. Processed a refund for the duplicate transaction to the original payment method.

description: Fiber cable was accidentally cut during home renovations.
priority: Performed a mechanical splice at the break point. Tested signal levels; loss is within acceptable -22dBm range.

description: Latency spikes occurring every 60 seconds exactly.
priority: Discovered a "Broadcast Storm" caused by a loop in a sub-switch. Enabled Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) to block the loop.

description: Router settings reset to factory defaults every time power is lost.
priority: Internal CMOS/NVRAM failure on the router hardware. Replaced the router with a new unit.

description: Smart Home devices (2.4GHz) won't connect to the new router.
priority: Discovered "Band Steering" was confusing legacy 2.4GHz chips. Created a dedicated 2.4GHz SSID for IoT devices.

description: Entire street has no internet; power is on.
priority: Water ingress found in the outdoor distribution box (DP). Dried the terminals and resealed the enclosure.

description: HR manager needs access to the payroll server folder.
priority: Modified NTFS permissions on the file server and added the user to the 'Payroll-Access' security group.

description: POE switch not powering up the attached IP cameras.
priority: Internal POE power supply failed. Replaced the switch with a 24-port POE+ model.

description: Customer wants to upgrade from 50Mbps to 300Mbps plan.
priority: Updated the subscriber profile in the BNG (Broadband Network Gateway) to the 300M/300M rate limit.

description: ONT shows "Alarm" light. Cable seems intact.
priority: Found the OLT port had been administratively disabled due to a rogue ONT detection. Re-authorized the ONT.

description: Only getting 50% of the promised speed over Wi-Fi.
priority: Used a Wi-Fi analyzer to find channel congestion on Channel 6. Switched router to Channel 1 (DFS) for cleaner airwaves.

description: Cannot log in to the employee portal from home.
priority: User's IP was blacklisted due to multiple failed login attempts. Whitelisted the IP and reset the account lockout.

description: The "Forgot Password" email is never received by users.
priority: SMTP relay was misconfigured on the mail server. Corrected the relay IP and verified email delivery.

description: Account suspended despite having an active credit balance.
priority: Logic error in the billing script ignored credit balances during the "Late Pay" sweep. Manually reactivated.

description: Video buffering on 4K streams; other sites are fast.
priority: Identified a peering bottleneck with the CDN provider. Adjusted BGP routing to favor a different exchange point.

description: Router's LAN port 1 is physically loose and disconnecting.
priority: Confirmed mechanical damage to the RJ45 port. Replaced the router under warranty.

description: Guest Wi-Fi password needs to be changed weekly for security.
priority: Implemented a scheduled script on the controller to rotate the WPA2 Pre-Shared Key (PSK) every Sunday.

description: Localized outage after a lightning storm.
priority: Found the OVP (Over Voltage Protection) blown at the building entry point. Replaced the protector and fuse.

description: New hire needs access to the "Engineering" Slack channel and Jira.
priority: Provisioned accounts via Okta SSO and added user to the relevant department groups.

description: Speeds drop significantly when the microwave oven is running in the kitchen.
priority: Identified 2.4GHz frequency interference. Switched customer devices to the 5GHz band and changed the 2.4GHz channel to 11.

description: Customer reports "LOS" light is blinking red after a heavy windstorm.
priority: Found the outdoor drop cable had tension damage near the pole. Re-tensioned and re-terminated the fiber connector.

description: Customer cannot port-forward for a home gaming server.
priority: User was behind a Carrier-Grade NAT (CGNAT). Assigned a static Public IP address to allow inbound port forwarding.

description: Wi-Fi works in the living room but "Dead Zones" found in the basement.
priority: Installed a Mesh Wi-Fi node in the hallway to extend coverage. Verified -65dBm signal strength in the basement.

description: Multiple users in a high-rise reporting intermittent "Request Timed Out" (RTO).
priority: Found an overheating edge switch in the building's MDF room. Replaced faulty cooling fans and restored airflow.

description: Customer getting "Error 691" on their PPPoE dialer.
priority: Verified account was locked due to an outstanding balance. Once payment was confirmed, cleared the lock on the AAA server.

description: Wireless Access Point (WAP) in the lobby has no lights and is cold to the touch.
priority: Tested POE injector; output was 0V. Replaced the 48V POE injector; WAP booted and broadcasted SSID immediately.

description: Request to enable "Bridge Mode" on the ONT for a custom pfSense router.
priority: Unbound the MAC address from the ONT's internal route table and enabled LAN1 bridge pass-through.

description: Ticket status changes back to "Open" automatically after being "Resolved."
priority: Found a race condition in the API's webhook. Updated the database logic to prevent status reversion after a 'Final' flag is set.

description: Customer claims they were charged a "Late Fee" despite paying on the due date.
priority: System processed the payment after 11:59 PM due to server lag. Waived the fee as a one-time gesture.

description: New IT Auditor needs "Logs Only" access to the firewall.
priority: Created a custom RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) profile on the firewall with 'Read-Only' permissions for logs.

description: Heavy packet loss observed only when uploading large files to Dropbox.
priority: Found MTU size mismatch on the WAN interface. Adjusted MTU to 1492 to account for PPPoE overhead.

description: IP address is showing as 169.254.x.x on the user's laptop.
priority: DHCP server pool was exhausted. Expanded the subnet mask from /24 to /23 to provide more available IP addresses.

description: ONT is making a high-pitched whining noise (coil whine).
priority: Internal capacitor failing. Replaced the ONT unit to prevent total hardware failure in the future.

description: Customer wants to hide their SSID for "security reasons."
priority: Disabled SSID Broadcast in the 2.4GHz and 5GHz radio settings as requested.

description: Sudden drop in light levels from -18dBm to -32dBm across 10 customers.
priority: Found a dirty bulkhead connector at the local splitter. Cleaned with one-click fiber cleaner; levels returned to -18dBm.

description: Download speed is fine, but Ping is 500ms+ in Valorant/League of Legends.
priority: Traced path to game servers; found a congested peering link at the IXP. Rerouted game traffic through a different upstream provider.

description: "MAC Address Not Authorized" error on a newly purchased router.
priority: The previous router's MAC was still bound to the port. Performed a 'MAC Flush' on the OLT port to allow the new device to pair.

description: The "Export to PDF" button on the billing page results in a blank page.
priority: PDF library (wkhtmltopdf) was missing a font dependency on the server. Installed 'tty-fonts' and restarted the service.

description: Laptop Ethernet port is not clicking in; the plastic tab is broken inside.
priority: Removed broken plastic debris from the RJ45 port using tweezers. Port is now functional.

description: Customer wants to set up a "Work From Home" VLAN for their office laptop.
priority: Configured a secondary SSID mapped to a dedicated VLAN with strict firewall rules separating it from the home LAN.

description: Bufferbloat detected during high-bandwidth usage.
priority: Enabled SQM (Smart Queue Management) with FQ_Codel on the router to prioritize small packets.

description: User plugged a LAN cable from one wall port to another, causing a network crash.
priority: Identified a "Layer 2 Loop" caused by the user. Enabled Loop Guard on the switch and shut down the offending port.

description: Customer cannot access 192.168.1.1.
priority: Found that the router's gateway IP had been changed to 192.168.0.1. Directed user to the correct local IP.

description: Wi-Fi keeps switching between 2.4G and 5G, causing a 1-second disconnect.
priority: Disabled "Smart Connect." Separated the bands into two distinct SSIDs: "Home_2.4G" and "Home_5G."

description: Power outage at the Central Office (CO).
priority: UPS took over for 30 mins, then the Diesel Generator kicked in. Service remained stable throughout the transition.

description: Admin needs SSH access to the core router from a specific external IP.
priority: Added an ACL entry to the management vty lines to permit the specific IP on Port 22.

description: Large "dark spot" on the Fiber patch panel where a cable was melted.
priority: Electrical short circuit in an adjacent rack caused thermal damage. Replaced the patch panel and re-terminated fibers.

description: Customer wants to downgrade plan to save money.
priority: Adjusted the billing cycle and modified the bandwidth shaper profile on the BNG to 20Mbps/20Mbps.

description: Only 2Mbps on Wi-Fi but 100Mbps on Ethernet.
priority: Found the router was forced to "802.11b" mode. Updated settings to "802.11n/ac Mixed" to allow higher throughput.
